entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:37 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Blizzard developing this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
